overview: These skater-boy buddies have told all their folks that they’re going out for a ride on their bikes – but it’s only half a truth. Yes, they’re going for a ride – but it involves riding thick, uncut cocks full of hot, creamy spunk, rather than anything with wheels! As a result, these horny young twinks are out of their cycling gear at the very first opportunity; making the most of each and every comfort break to enjoy the raw, unrefined pleasures that only dick can give a boy. All culminating in a devastating blow-out of pent-up jizz for every lad!
title: Skater Boy Paradise
